title: Public Transportation Available, Satellite Available, Courtyard
posting_body: ['Relax & Enjoy Welcome HomeSeacrest Apartment Homes offers stylish 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom floor plans with 13 distinctive layouts.', 'Each apartment home has its own unique characteristics for enhancing comfort, style and exquisite design.', 'An abundant variety of community amenities completes the unique spirit of our community.', 'Unwind at one of our six sun-drenched pools or exercise on our tennis court or three sports pools!', "Our superb location in relation to an array of outdoor parks, including: Fire Wheel Golf Park, Breckinridge Park and Spring Creek Forest Preserve, makes our community an outdoor-enthusiast's dream home!", 'Schedule A Tour', '-Ceramic Tile', '-DSL Internet Available', '-Fireplace', "-Resident's Lounge", '-Ceiling Fans', '-Built-In Microwave', '-Public Transportation Available', '-3 Sports Pools', '-Refrigerator', '-Resident Activities', '-Cable Available', '-Air Conditioning', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
